sentences.sentence: A palmist also looks at the shape of the fingertips and nails.
sentences.translation: 手相师也看指尖和指甲的形状。

sentences.sentence: Palmist: The life line in your hand tells that you will die in a year.
sentences.translation: 手相大师：你手上的生命线显示出你还有一年将会死去。

sentences.sentence: Palmist: : The life line in your hand tells that you will die in a year.
sentences.translation: 手相大师：你手上的生命线显示出你还有一年将会死去。 。
